entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 2 with risk of frost.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries and rain showers near midnight. Snow level 1600 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
